coded_answer.p: I am writing to complain about a musical show on the 1010th of June, and I was very disappinteddisappointed.

I was promised that the starringstar was Danny Brock but when I was there I saw just otheranother starringstar that was completely differencedifferent from your brocharbrochure. To make the matter worse, I was travellinghad travelled to London to see this famous starringstar but I didn't see any shows ofwith themhim. It makemakes me a bit angry.

According into your brochourbrochure, it was started to showthe show would start at 19.30 p.m. but it was startedstarted at 20.15 p.m. I wanted to sleep and it was very anoyingannoying. More than that, when I bought the ticket I didn't get any discountsdiscount. I had to pay full priseprice.

I was promised that after the show I could go to the theatre restaurant but due to the show startedstarting late weit asloalso finished late, therefore, when I went to the restaurant they were deffinatelydefinitely closed. I was very hungry and tired. You said that it was a perfect evening out but it wasn't like that.
I would like you to refund some of my money back. I paid for the show £ 50.00£ 50.00 for the show. I also have a recitereceipt to prove it. I would like you to give my money back as soon as possible.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets.
I have a really good, freindfriend, Pat who I was trustedtrusted and counted on her. I have knowknown her for five years. andAnd we were loveloved each other very much.

One day, I was fallingfell in love with my closest freindfriend. I went out with him sometimes and we were happy. My boy freindfriendboyfriend was very handsome, clever and very polite. We were stedystudystudying atin the same class at school and he also knowedknew Pat as well. Personally, I wanted to keep it seretssecret because I was afraid that we might have splitedsplitsplit up. And I would like to make sure that he was rellyreally loveloved me. My boy freindfriendboyfriend told me that he wanted to surprise his freindfriend in his class when the times comescomecamethe time came.
To be honest, I wanted to share this fellingfeeling towith someone else but I needed to keep it very secret. I felt unhappy sometimes.

One day I decided to tell my best freindfriend - Pat, who I realio-onrelied on her. I told her everything abatabout my boyfreindboyfriend and when we were metmet each other and evertaulyeventually we were fallingfell in love. After I told her I felt my feeling had been released and I was happy. I also told her to keep it very secretand didn'tnot tell anyone in the class.

On Monday morning, I walked into the class and all of my freindfriendfriends waswere shouting at me and calledcalling my name and my boyfreindboyfriend. I was absolutelyvery ambaressedembarrassed and I wanted to ranrun out of the class.
I felt very angry towith Pat and I shouldn't have told her about my boy friendboyfriend. I felt regret but it was too late it. It wasn't a secret any moreanymore now.
